author: CBC News
title: Setting snares and building lean-tos: Elsipogtog youth get crash in surviving winter outdoors | CBC News
description: Youth in Elsipogtog First Nation, about 91 km north of Moncton, N.B., got a crash course in everything from setting rabbit snares to building a shelter from scratch as part of a two-day program to teach them winter survival skills.
content: Eight Mi'kmaq youth from Elsipogtog First Nation, about 91 km north of Moncton, N.B., snowshoed into the deep woods earlier this week as part of a two-day program to teach them winter survival skillsâ€¦ [+2460 chars]
